analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na akusalam dhammam paccayā dassanena pahātabbaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ

original: abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
